info.name: Reddit6 Black custom theme
info.description:
Dark theme for Reddit6 / redditr, works only on website, not on extension. Preview: http://i.imgur.com/ypHE89V.png
INFO: zoom the page to 150% for perfect experience
info.additionalInfo:
[!][!][!] INFO: zoom the page to 150% for perfect experience, using ctrl + "+"
Preview: http://i.imgur.com/ypHE89V.png
